page.title: 18SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: Our class conducted a survey of 20 shops in the Risca area by making up a questionnaire of 18 questions and sending them to 20 different shops. We found out some very interesting things. {SATURDAY}is the busiest day of the week for all the shops we asked. We think this is because most people don't work then so they have time for shopping. We asked the shops how many customers they had altogether over Monday, Thursday and Saturday. The busiest was a newsagent with 2900 customers (this beat even a supermarket which had 2200). The least busy shop was a car sales with only about 40 customers. The longest any of the shopkeepers has been working in Risca is 55 years. This is{McCartheys'}the grocer.
